description: PULL Public Relations, a rapidly growing full-service fashion creative agency based in LA, is looking for Fall 2024 PR Interns to join our team. No prior experience is required, however the ideal applicant must be eager to learn and available to work in-person at our LA office in the 90048 area code this fall on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9:30AM-5PM. Compensation is provided in the form of school credit only.
responsibilities:
Duties Include:

* Scouting new talent to collaborate with for fashion clients
* Ensuring showroom and office is kept in top shape; including steaming product, maintaining displays, restocking shelves
* Product inventories
* Documenting gifting orders and stylist pulls
* Packaging gifts and writing notecards for VIPs, influencers, and editors
* Basic administrative tasks and office duties including updating monthly reporting docs and press clippings
* Assisting team on stylist and influencer showroom appointments
* Building editorial outreach lists
* Developing pitch ideas for editorial publications
* Participating in creative brainstorming

qualifications.required:
Positive can-do attitude is a must!
Detail-oriented and a go-getter
Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment and work on multiple projects
